response.overview: The protagonist of the story, Ullas, has been disabled since his birth. Ullas walks in a wheelchair over a giant. Ullas feels to have a female companion and informs same to his father. The father begins to search for the girl to marry him, but no girl comes forward to marry him. He then enlists the help of Jack Mama to find a girl in prostitution to satisfy his sexual desire. Ullas draws on a blind girl Dimple in the same vein. He starts to like her, spends time with her. He proposes Dimple to marry him. At first Ullas’s Father refuses his son’s decision. Dimple, meanwhile, leaves the town since Ullas father’s rejection. However beacuse of Dimple’s good behavior Ullas' father agrees to marry her. Meanwhile Ullas begins to find Dimple. He gets the help of his father, Jack Mama and friend Giri, to find Dimple.
response.title: Wheel Chair Romeo
